thread.title: McDonald’s on lockdown after man, 21 stabbed in early morning attack
thread.title_full: McDonald’s on lockdown after man, 21 stabbed in early morning attack

author: elake
title: McDonald’s on lockdown after man, 21 stabbed in early morning attack
text:
A MAN, 21, was stabbed in a McDonald’s restaurant early this morning. 
The McDonald’s branch in Leicester, is on lockdown following the attack shortly after 4.30am. Google A man has been stabbed in McDonald’s Market Street, Leicester Video from outside and inside Leicester McDonald's after young man stabbed 
A police spokesperson told Leicester Mercury : "An investigation is underway after a man was assaulted in the McDonald's restaurant in Market Street, Leicester, during the early hours of the morning. 
"The 21-year-old victim suffered a stab wound during a fight in the restaurant just after 4.30am this morning. related stories FIGHT FOR OUR FREE PRESS Don't let the Government and rich celebs deny YOU a Press free to expose wrongdoing STREET STABBING HORROR Woman arrested after stabbing which has left man fighting for life SLAYED IN FRONT OF HER KIDS Dad admits stabbing pregnant wife to death in front of their two children after months of abuse horror in hollywood One person killed and three injured in stabbing rampage LA burger joint that ended in police shooting SHOOTING MYSTERY Man who had been shot and stabbed found slumped in car in east London 
"Inquires are ongoing to establish the circumstances leading up to the assault. 
"The restaurant has been cordoned off while officers carry out further inquiries. 
"The victim remains in hospital but his injuries are not believed to be serious." 
Anyone with information is asked to contact the police on 101
